de: 2012 amendments (Regional arrangements for port reception facilities under MARPOL Annex VI and Certification of marine diesel engines fitted with Selective Catalytic Reduction systems under the NO x Technical Code 2008) to the Annex to MAPROL Annex VI (MEPC.217(63) - 02-03-2012 - Protokoll vom 26. September 1997 zur Änderung des Internationalen Übereinkommens von 1973 zur Verhütung der Meeresverschmutzung durch Schiffe in der Fassung des Protokolls von 1978 zu diesem Übereinkommen
en: 2012 amendments (Regional arrangements for port reception facilities under MARPOL Annex VI and Certification of marine diesel engines fitted with Selective Catalytic Reduction systems under the NO x Technical Code 2008) to the Annex to MAPROL Annex VI (MEPC.217(63) - 02-03-2012 - Protocol of 1997 to amend the International Convention for the prevention of pollution from ships, 1973, as modified by the Protocol of 1978 relating thereto
it:
2012 amendments (Regional arrangements for port reception facilities under MARPOL Annex VI and Certification of marine diesel engines fitted with Selective Catalytic Reduction systems under the NO x Technical Code 2008) to the Annex to MAPROL Annex VI (MEPC.217(63) - 02-03-2012 - Protocollo del 26 settembre 1997 (MARPOL PROT 1997)
che modifica la Convenzione internazionale del 1973
per la prevenzione dell'inquinamento causato da navi,
nella versione del relativo Protocollo del 1978
fr: 2012 amendments (Regional arrangements for port reception facilities under MARPOL Annex VI and Certification of marine diesel engines fitted with Selective Catalytic Reduction systems under the NO x Technical Code 2008) to the Annex to MAPROL Annex VI (MEPC.217(63) - 02-03-2012 - Protocole du 26 septembre 1997 modifiant la Convention internationale de 1973 pour la prévention de la pollution par les navires, telle que modifiée par le Protocole de 1978 y relatif
